title: Wind Cave National Park: Then and Now
body: CCC - Then and Now       Legacy of the CCC The National Park Service was one of the largest participants in CCC projects. It was said that without the Corps help, it would have taken fifty years to accomplish what these men did in nine. The young men of Camp Wind Cave transformed a struggling park into the one you enjoy today.
